page.title: 18TRADE IN HOCKWOLD
page.content: With the exception of petrol & clothes essential commodities are available in the village.3 general stores offer groceries,greengroceries,milk,bread, frozen meat etc.Regular{doorstep {deliveries}of milk,bread,vegs. & news- papers are made & fresh fish by mobile van twice weekly.{Roadside}stalls offer vegs.eggs & flowers.The Post Office combines fresh meat and general goods.A new discount store has opened. {Vidio tapes}are delivered weekly.An { {Antiques}shop expanded attracting USA visitors.There is a long established Public House,The Red Lion,& Village Club which are well patronised.The { {Hairdressers}shop works to capacity although home visiting by hairdressers to the elderly and housebound is popular.
